cz.kinst.jakub.diploma.offloading.deeco.components

Class DeviceComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.kinst.jakub.diploma.offloading.deeco.components.DeviceComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DeviceComponent
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Device component gathers Monitor definitions from PlannerComponent and spawns new BackendMonitorComponent for each of them

    --------------------------- Created by Jakub Kinst 2015 E-mail: jakub@kinst.cz

    See Also:
